action.primary: Invigorates the Blood and regulates menstruation

notes: For chronic pelvic inflammatory disease: Use an enema consisting 15g of this herb, 25g Hb. Hedyotis #{BaiHuaSheSheCao} Bai Hua She She Cao, 25g Flos Lonicerae #{JinYinHua} Jin Yin Hua, 15g Rx. Sophorae Flavescentis #{KuShen} Ku Shen, 15g Per. Zanthoxyli #{ChuanJiao} Chuan Jiao, and 20g Hb Violae #{ZiHuaDiDing} Zi Hua Di Ding. Add 500ml water, decoct to 80-100 ml), add 1% procaine 10ml and 80000 U gentamicin .
Topical application: wash with the decoction.
It is traditionally used to treat dimness of vision.
